problem_text: Find the perimeter of the \triangle C B H, if \triangle C B H \sim \triangle F E H, A D E G is a parallelogram, C H = 7, F H = 10, F E = 11, and E H = 6. Rounded to the nearest tenth.
compact_text: Find the perimeter of the \triangle CBH, if \triangle CBH \sim \triangle FEH, ADEG is a parallelogram, CH = 7, FH = 10, FE = 11, and EH = 6. Rounded to the nearest tenth.
annotat_text: Find the perimeter of the $\triangle CBH,$ if $\triangle CBH \sim \triangle FEH$, $ADEG$ is a parallelogram, $CH=7$, $FH=10, FE=11$, and $EH=6$. Rounded to the nearest tenth.
